Package org.tweetyproject.logics.pl.analysis

Class SatBasedInconsistencyMeasure

java.lang.Object
org.tweetyproject.logics.commons.analysis.BeliefSetInconsistencyMeasure<PlFormula>
org.tweetyproject.logics.pl.analysis.SatBasedInconsistencyMeasure
All Implemented Interfaces:
PostulateEvaluatable<PlFormula>, InconsistencyMeasure<BeliefSet<PlFormula,?>>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContensionSatInconsistencyMeasure, DHitSatInconsistencyMeasure, DMaxSatInconsistencyMeasure, DSumSatInconsistencyMeasure, HsSatInconsistencyMeasure
public abstract class SatBasedInconsistencyMeasure extends BeliefSetInconsistencyMeasure<PlFormula>
A common base class for inconsistency measure implementations based on SAT encodings.
Author:
Anna Gessler

    Field
    Description
    protected boolean
    maxIsInfinity
    If set to true, the value infinity is returned if no inconsistency value is found in the range of possible values.
    protected int
    offset
    An optional value that is subtracted from the calculated inconsistency value.
    protected SatSolver
    solver
    The SAT solver used to test the SAT encodings for satisfiability.

  • Field Details

    • solver

      protected SatSolver solver
      The SAT solver used to test the SAT encodings for satisfiability.

    • maxIsInfinity

      protected boolean maxIsInfinity
      If set to true, the value infinity is returned if no inconsistency value is found in the range of possible values.

    • offset

      protected int offset
      An optional value that is subtracted from the calculated inconsistency value.

  • Method Details

    • binarySearchValue

      protected double binarySearchValue(Collection<PlFormula> kb, int min, int max)
      Use binary search to search the space of possible inconsistency values, making calls to the SAT encoding of "is x an upper bound for the inconsistency value of kb".
      Parameters:
      kb - input knowledge base
      min - minimum of current search interval
      max - maximum of current search interval
      Returns:
      the inconsistency value, if found, infinity or an Exception otherwise

    • getSATEncoding

      protected abstract PlBeliefSet getSATEncoding(Collection<PlFormula> kb, int upper_bound)
      Returns a SAT encoding of the problem "is upper_bound an upper_bound for the inconsistency value of this knowledge base?"
      Parameters:
      kb - belief set
      upper_bound - the upper bound to encode
      Returns:
      SAT encoding based on the specific inconsistency measure

    • getCnfEncoding

      protected Conjunction getCnfEncoding(PlBeliefSet f)
      Returns the given formula in conjunctive normal form.
      Parameters:
      f - formula
      Returns:
      formula in CNF
